=============
clear_filters
=============

.. py:method:: clear_filters(self) 

**domain**: server

**language**: python

**class** :doc:`Item class </refs/server/item_api>`

Description
===========

Use ``clear_filters`` to set filter values of the item to ``None``.

See also
========

:doc:`Filtering records </programming/data/filtering_records>`

:doc:`Filters </programming/data/filters>`
